100.name: Glue Soak
100.description: Glue soaks through all layers of Bloon.

200.name: Corrosive Glue
200.description: Glued Bloons pop one layer every few seconds. (1d/2s)

300.name: Bloon Dissolver
300.description: Extreme solvents melt two layers every second. (1d/0.65s)

400.name: Bloon Liquefier
400.description: Can glue one additional Bloon per shot and applies liquefying compounds that do 10 pops every second. (1d/0.1s)

500.name: The Bloon Solver
500.description: Bloons a problem? Here's the solution.

020.name: Glue Splatter
020.description: Splatters glue across up to 6 Bloons per shot.

040.name: Glue Strike
040.description: Glue Strike ability: Glues all Bloons on screen, causing them to take more damage from all sources while it lasts.

050.name: Glue Storm
050.description: Glue Storm ability pelts the whole screen over 15 seconds with glue. Glued Bloons take extra damage while glued.

001.name: Stickier Glue
001.description: Makes glue effect last much longer.

003.name: MOAB Glue
003.description: Improved glue formula allows it to stick to MOAB-class Bloons.

004.name: Relentless Glue
004.description: Popped Bloons that were glued leave a blob of glue on the track.

005.name: Super Glue
005.description: Glue so strong it temporarily immobilizes all affected Bloons!
